translation: If a woman wants to cultivate the teachings of this child's scripture for her little one.

When he rises in the morning, he says.

source_sentence: 栴檀乾闥婆大鬼神□□□書十五鬼神形像。
translation: Inside the inner courtyard, he writes the image of the great Brahma heavenly king and the great sandalwood and gandharva ghosts, and he writes the images of 15 ghosts.
After he had thus constructed them as described, the great king of Brahmā repeatedly made them.

source_sentence: 爾時大梵天王重白佛言。
translation: The king of the Brahmā gods then repeatedly said to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 我為欲利養安樂閻浮提諸小兒故。
translation: "It's because I want to nourish and comfort the small children of Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 唯願世尊聽許說最極密印陀羅尼。
translation: Please let the Bhagavān hear and approve of this dhāraṇī of the most extremely mysterious seal.
This is the dhāraṇī that he said.

source_sentence: 多恎他阿伽羅伽寗那伽伽寗波漏隷伽婆隷婆隷不隷羅收禰修羅俾遮羅俾波陀尼波羅呵阿曷利沙尼那易禰那易蘇婆呵其印相。
translation: "After he attains the stage of Agastya Agastya and Nāgasagama, he says, 'The dhāraṇī of the seal of the Akṣobhya-kumāra-kumāra-kumāra-parvata-parvata-parvata-parvata-parvata-parvata'.
He sets out to twist a water armor in emptiness.
It's like taking the shape of a flower.
This is called a fist at the waist.

source_sentence: 若以此陀羅尼印加持病惱者。
translation: If he applies this dhāraṇī seal to his illnesses and disorders, they'll be cured.
It will instantly remove them.

source_sentence: 此陀羅尼被縛一切諸天。
translation: This dhāraṇī is bound to all the gods and goddesses.
All great spirit kings, and all great lesser spirits and animals of the underworld.
All great lesser spirits and species of the underworld.
Only those who have compassion won't be bound.
All the demons, gods, and spirit kings that bind them will have their heads broken into seven parts.
Their heads are all broken into seven parts.
They're like the branches of an āli tree.

source_sentence: 爾時栴檀乾闥婆大鬼王。
translation: It was then that the great demon king of the sandalwood and the gandharva ranged from there.
He was joined by fifteen great ghosts and spirits.
They were gods, spirits, and dark destinies.
They all came together and threw themselves to the ground in five pieces.
They said to the great king of Brahmā.
"We all abandoned our bad thoughts.
We want to protect this dhāraṇī and the boy.
"Please let the king of Brahmā teach the dhāraṇī.
Cause all the ghosts and spirits to protect the boy.

source_sentence: 又護童子經除惡成吉祥。
translation: The sūtra on guarding the child also removes evil and makes it auspicious.

source_sentence: 栴檀乾闥婆王即說陀羅尼曰。
translation: The Caṇḍā-Kandaka king then spoke the dhāraṇī, saying.

source_sentence: 曩莫三曼多沒馱(引)喃(引一)尾戌馱薩縛(二合)囉嚩(引)係係娑嚩(二合)賀內縛申水輪勿頭合是也。
translation: "This is the name of the dhāraṇī that was explained in the Sanmmanta-buddha (citation needed) and the Weixu-dunda-saṃvara (citation needed) and the Saṃvara (dichotomy) Hevāsin Water Wheel Maitreya.
It's called a seal and a dhāraṇī.
This is the seal and dhāraṇī.
It will extinguish all great epidemics and diseases.
It removes all four hundred and four illnesses.

source_sentence: 一切鬼神常恒守護不離此人邊。
translation: All demons and spirits are constantly on guard, and they don't leave this person's side.
This dhāraṇī accomplishes all that's sought and all that's holy.
I'll also explain the fifteen demonic dhāraṇīs.
It's for the benefit of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 唯願大梵王說十五眷屬陀羅尼。
translation: May it please the king of the Brahmas to recite the dhāraṇī for fifteen dependents.
He then said.

source_sentence: 南無佛陀耶(一)南無達麼耶(二)南無僧伽耶南無酬迦鬼彌迦王鬼騫陀王鬼阿波悉魔羅鬼牟致迦鬼魔致迦鬼閻彌迦鬼迦彌尼鬼梨婆坻鬼富多那鬼曼多難提鬼舍究尼鬼揵吒波尼尼鬼目佉曼荼鬼藍婆鬼莎呵大梵天王重白佛言。
translation: "Namo buddha-ya(a) namo dharma-ya(b) namo saṃgaya-ya Namo rewardga ghost mika king ghost khaṇḍa king ghost apasimora ghost moutika ghost moutika ghost moutika ghost yamika ghost khamini ghost Revata ghost pūtanā ghost mantanandi ghost shesanian ghost gandharva ghost sahā The king of Brahmā heavens repeatedly said to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 有眾生於此陀羅尼能受持念誦。
translation: "Are there sentient beings who can memorize and recite this dhāraṇī?
It will cease ten thousand evils and produce ten thousand good [qualities].

source_sentence: 一切鬼神一切惡神慈悲加護。
translation: All ghosts and spirits and all bad spirits will compassionately guard it.

source_sentence: 爾時大梵天帝釋天白佛言。
translation: It was then that the Mahābrahma Tṛkṣa Heaven said to the Buddha.
"I have a dhāraṇī for protecting the children.
It's called the dhāraṇī of long life and prolonged life.'

source_sentence: 此陀羅尼能消滅定業延壽命。
translation: This dhāraṇī can extinguish the karma of concentration and prolong life.

source_sentence: 次說勸請十五鬼神呪曰。
translation: Next, he says a spell to invoke fifteen demonic spirits.

source_sentence: 南摩三曼多勃馱喃(一)耽令令閻微枳履儞弭履訶娑難羅娑難特[怡-台+暮]娑難[糸*晝]莎呵印相。

source_sentence: 次說散粇米花曰(用金剛掌)。

source_sentence: 如是神等令一切眾生常惱害眾生坐生氣殺萬性人民。
